heat_labs_team.name: Team Token
heat_labs_team.description: Awarded to official team members who help build, maintain, and steer HEAT Labs. This token marks those directly involved in development, writing, content creation, and the long-term direction of HEAT Labs.

heat_labs_supporters.name: Supporter Token
heat_labs_supporters.description: Granted to supporters and donors who help keep the project alive. This token recognizes those who contribute financially to HEAT Labs and allow us to keep doing what we do.

heat_labs_contributors.name: Contributor Token
heat_labs_contributors.description: Awarded to contributors who provide meaningful input to HEAT Labs and its content. This token represents hands-on contributions that help improve and expand the project.

heat_labs_testers.name: Tester Token
heat_labs_testers.description: Given to testers who actively help identify bugs, issues, and other problems. This token honours those who put in time testing features before release.

heat_labs_creators.name: Creator Token
heat_labs_creators.description: Awarded to featured content creators whose work is showcased on HEAT Labs. This token recognizes creators who help grow the community through videos, streams, guides, or other media.
